name: Pink Rush
description:
Pink Rush is a game where you fondle between ants and candies. Try find all candies before its too late.

Avoid touching ants because it might hurt you. And when you find cherry it will get you some extra time to complete the candy quest.

And do-not let ants to have your candies!

Rules:

In this game you will get 30 second to complete your quest. And by completing each quest you will get more time to complete the next. Each time you level up the game will also increases its difficulty.

  • Collect all candy to level up.
  • Collect cherry to get 5 sec more.
  • Avoid ants
  •  WASD and Arrow Keys (movement)
  • ESC, Pause (Pause/Quit Menu)

Good luck and enjoy!

Game made on : GODOT Game Engine
